attributes.action: Remove Graphic videos and pictures from search engines
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that  all videos and pictures which show graphic executions should be banned from all search engines and newspapers to protect the families of those who have been murdered another hands of their captors.

Children also have access to these graphic videos, who we should also be protecting from these barbaric scenes. Allowing Isis and other groups like them to put their violence and the beheading of innocent people on search engines and in newspapers should be stopped immediately. By allowing this to continue is condoning their actions.
